forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. South wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the skies are enveloped in a blanket of clouds, hinting at the gentle embrace of the marine layer. The temperature hovers around a comfortable 50 degrees, a whisper of chill that lends a crispness to the air. As the day unfolds, the clouds will part, bestowing upon us an inviting sun that will reach toward a high of 64. Yet, a slight drop in temperature during the afternoon will usher in a refreshing reminder of autumn's subtle grip.

Despite the current cloudiness, the promise of sunshine makes the day feel anticipated, with the soft winds from the south gently stirring the air. This blend of mild warmth and cool breezes suggests a perfect day for strolls through the parks or leisurely visits to nearby cafes. Dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater over a T-shirt to adapt to the transition from morning chill to afternoon glow. It could be the ideal moment to explore the lesser-known corners of the city, perhaps indulging in some local art or simply enjoying the barely-there fog trickling around the cityscape, adding an air of mystery to the urban vibrancy.
